New Records: Jasprit Bumrah was named Player of the Match
Rohit Sharma scored 52 before retiring hurt
Key Match Events: India won by 8 wickets with 46 balls remaining
Rishabh Pant ended the match with a six off McCarthy
Josh Little was bowled by Jasprit Bumrah with a yorker
Hardik Pandya took three wickets in quick succession
Ireland's top order struggled against the Indian seamers
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bowl first
The pitch had significant movement and was challenging for batters
Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of adapting to the conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience
Paul Stirling acknowledged Ireland's struggles and looked forward to upcoming matches
The ICC raised concerns about the pitch quality
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was described as 'not fit for purpose' for T20 cricket
The match was a pivotal moment in India's World Cup campaign
Ireland's batting performance was criticized for poor shot selection
